author: cms-sw
body: New bot test  https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/pull/1842 shows that there are package files which were not properly relocated. This fixes some of those https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/pull-request-integration/PR-9d1ce0/27660/externals-checks.log
title: relocate more package files [1/N]
